title: Sun Transit in the 6th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When the Sun transits the 6th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, focus intensifies on discipline, service, and problem-solving. This phase strengthens the will to overcome obstacles, competitors, and health challenges through consistent effort. Leadership expresses itself through duty rather than display. Work pressure may rise, but resilience and authority help manage conflicts effectively. If ego is kept in check, this transit supports victory over adversities, improved health routines, and recognition earned through perseverance and responsible service.

sections.title: Finance
points: Expenses tied to work or health

closing: This Sun transit empowers discipline and resilience. With humility, it brings victory over challenges, steady growth, and respect earned through service.
